response.original_title: how to get rid of totalav popup?➥ US-1-855-535-4580
response.overview: ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 If you are seeing frequent TotalAV upgrade or notification pop-ups on your Windows PC or Mac➤ US-1-855-535-4580 , you can start by opening the TotalAV dashboard and reviewing the notification and alert settings to reduce promotional messages. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 ➤  Many pop-ups appear because you are using a free or trial version, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 so upgrading to a premium plan or disabling marketing notifications inside your account settings may help minimize repeated upgrade reminders. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580  On Windows, you can also check system notification settings by going to Settings > System > Notifications and turning off unnecessary alerts related to antivirus or security software. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580
response.title: how to get rid of totalav popup?➥ US-1-855-535-4580
